title: Day 1350
content:
# Day 1350

I made a song to describe my Monday:

**[Verse 1]**
 Put the kid to bed, lights low, all sweet
 Then I blink once... I'm the one fallin' asleep
 Jolt up like "damn," gotta climb out again
 Medium ain't gonna write itself with this pen
 Momma in the hallway, arms crossed - oh boy
 'Cause Dad 3D-printed Bitcoin Bs like toys
 "Don't put 'em on the mantel!" why babe, why?
 "Because plastic clutter makes my soul wanna die."

**[Hook]**
 Rash-cream rhapsody, toothpaste on the wall
 Turn around two seconds, she destroyin' it all
 Kids are chaos, kids are magic, kids are full-time smoke
 Hardest thing you'll ever do - GOOD, that ain't a joke
 I'm exhausted, barely lookin' at the screen right now
 Energy down bad, alp ain't helpin' me out
 But we livin', we laughin', we surviving this scene
 Whole house smells like toddler and a tube of rash cream

**[Verse 2]**
 Two-year-old wild like a Category 5
 Rash cream in her hair like she moisturized
 Now she glidin' through the house like a minty ghost
 Toothpaste fingerprints on every surface we own
 Meanwhile Dad printing Bitcoin Bs like art
 Think I got carried away - printed 36 parts
 Momma lookin' at the shelf like "I swear to God..."
 I'm just tryin' to orange-pill the whole dang squad

**[Bridge]**
 This ain't a meltdown, this is parenthood glory
 Every day a brand-new WTF story
 Laugh through the madness 'cause the madness won't quit
 Someday I'll sleep... maybe... I guess... a lil' bit

**[Hook]**
 Rash-cream rhapsody, toothpaste on the wall
 Turn around two seconds, she destroyin' it all
 Kids are chaos, kids are magic, kids are full-time smoke
 Hardest thing you'll ever do - GOOD, that ain't a joke
 I'm exhausted, barely lookin' at the screen right now
 Energy down bad, alp ain't helpin' me out
 But we livin', we laughin', we surviving this scene
 Whole house smells like toddler and a tube of rash cream

**[Outro]**
 So here I am, half-awake, still writin'
 Life is a circus and the toddlers are the titans
 But I wouldn't trade a moment, not for anything...
 Even if my whole house smells like Desitin cream.

![It's actually quite a bop. Listen to it here: [https://x.com/ConorChepenik/status/1995680131810295887](https://x.com/ConorChepenik/status/1995680131810295887?s=20)](https://miro.medium.com/1*_y1xLsELaHh1KZuhymu3WQ.png)

Yes Sloan really did grab Ryder's cradle crap cream and spread it all over her fingers right after I took the toothpaste from her. I can't even be mad this child is so smart, but my gosh... How she finds a way to get into everything is beyond me. I've got a child prodigy on my hands but it's not easy raising a prodigy ðŸ˜‚ .

Until tomorrow anon :)

12/1/25

Conor Jay Chepenik
